answers.answer: I do that from time to time and I'm in my 40's... I was dignosed Oct 2009best thing to do is call her Dr. or Nurse. I'm a Veteran so I call the tele-nurseor go down to the ER. Even in winter time I drink lots and lots of water...Call her Dr. now and ask what is best for her...

question: my 24 month old daughter has type 1 diabetes and she is peeing and drinking a lot is that normal even when her blood sugar levels are normal?
title: child with type 1 diabetes
